summary:
We need to produce JSON with keys: summary, business_intent, keywords (list). Must not list method names verbatim. Focus on class responsibility and state/behavior. Provide English.

Class: StableDiffusionTiledUpscalePipeline. Docstring: Pipeline for tile-based text-guided image super-resolution using Stable Diffusion 2, trading memory for compute to create gigantic images. Inherits from StableDiffusionUpscalePipeline. Takes VAE, text_encoder, tokenizer, unet, low_res_scheduler, scheduler. So summary: describes pipeline that performs tile-based upscaling of images guided by text prompts using Stable Diffusion 2, handling large images by processing in tiles to reduce memory usage.

Business intent: Provide a tool for generating high-resolution, text-conditioned images at massive scales, useful for media, advertising, design, etc., enabling creation of large images without high GPU memory.

Keywords: stable diffusion, tiled upscaling, super-resolution, text-guided, image generation, VAE, UNet, scheduler, low-res conditioning, large images, memory-efficient, diffusion model.

Make sure not to list method names. Provide JSON.

Summary: "Implements a tile‑based diffusion pipeline that enlarges low‑resolution images into very high‑resolution outputs under the direction of a textual prompt, using Stable Diffusion 2 components while swapping memory usage for additional computation."

Business intent: "Enable creators, marketers, and designers to produce ultra‑high‑resolution, text‑conditioned visuals without requiring high‑end GPU memory, supporting use‑cases such as large‑format prints, billboards, and detailed digital art."

Keywords list.

  "keywords": [

    "text‑guided image generation",
